original: 會稽上虞人，東吳官吏。以術數占卜聞名，為當時能人異士「八絕」之一。多次預言時事，料事如神。但自珍其才，不輕易外傳所學，神乎其技的卜算之技因而失傳。
text: Kuaiji Shangyu, Soochow official. Known for divination by number, he was one of the "eight musts" of capable men and strangers at that time. Foretelling current events many times, and predicting things like gods. However, he cherishes his talents and does not easily spread what he has learned, so the magical divination skills are lost.
